value.description: The Xbox Cyber Monday 2024 sale offers discounts of up to 40% on top titles, and up to 25% on controllers, and bundles a subscription to Game Pass in the process at a discounted price. Here are the 7 best deals on consoles, controllers, games, and more.

value.name: This OLED Surface Pro deal makes it the best 2-in-1 ever made
value.description: I loved the Surface Pro 11th Edition. In my review of it, I tell people to “just buy it.” If you’ve ever been curious about the Surface Pro, the 11th-generation model feels like the version of this device that I’ve always wanted it to be.

value.name: The best AI tools of 2024: all the generative AI apps you need to try
value.description: One of the first AI image generators to be released back in 2022, Midjourney has proven immensely popular with users and art critics alike. It can output high-definition, photorealistic images in countless artistic styles based on natural language text prompts.

value.name: 12 Of The Most Important Moments In Microsoft's History
value.description: Microsoft has been a major player in the tech industry for decades. Over those years, it's had a lot of big milestones moments, for better and for worse.

value.name: Tech stock gains push Wall Street higher still; CEO of fallen chip giant Intel is out
value.description: It’s the latest action of more than three years of aggressive antitrust enforcement shepherded by FTC Chair Lina Chan, who was elevated to lead the agency by President Joe Biden after he came into office pledging tougher scrutiny of monopolistic behavior by Big Tech companies.

value.name: Amazon is giving its data centers a facelift for the generative AI age
value.description: Amazon ( AMZN) is giving its massive Amazon Web Services (AWS) data centers a facelift. The company announced it’s improving the efficiency, availability, and design of its enormous computing facilities to keep them up and running for its customers and provide them with the kind of processing power they need to run new generative AI applications.

value.name: Crash Team Racing Nitro-Fueled Coming to Xbox Game Pass This Week
value.description: Crash Team Racing Nitro-Fueled has been confirmed for Xbox Game Pass, and will arrive on the service on December 4th.

value.name: Rising tech stocks pull Wall Street to another record
value.description: NEW YORK — Technology stocks pulled Wall Street to another record amid a mixed Monday of trading. The Standard & Poor’s 500 rose 0.2% from its all-time high set on Friday to post a record for the 54th time this year. The Dow Jones industrial average fell 128 points, or 0.3%, while the Nasdaq composite gained 1%.

value.name: FTC opens Microsoft antitrust investigation that Trump administration must carry on or drop
value.description: Antitrust enforcers with the Federal Trade Commission have opened a wide-ranging investigation into Microsoft’s business practices, starting off a big legal project that an incoming Trump administration must take up or abandon.

value.name: Pat Gelsinger Suddenly Retires After Three Rough Years as Intel CEO
value.description: Intel's stock price has seen better days, but Pat Gelsinger has also led the company through numerous scandals with its latest processors.

value.name: Decision Tree Regression from Scratch Using C#
value.description: Dr. James McCaffrey from Microsoft Research presents a complete end-to-end demonstration of decision tree regression using the C# language. Unlike most implementations, this one does not use recursion or pointers,

value.name: Another Activision Blizzard gem is crashing onto Xbox Game Pass in *checks watch* two days
value.description: Crash Team Racing Nitro-Fueled is joining the Xbox Game Pass lineup on Dec. 4, 2024. A handful of other Activision Blizzard games from the company's catalogue have been added to Xbox Game Pass in recent months, including Call of Duty: Modern Warfare 3, Crash Bandicoot N. Sane Trilogy, and the Spyro Reignited Trilogy.

value.name: Top 5 Cyber Security Trends for 2025
value.description: TechRepublic asked cyber experts to predict the top trends that will impact the security field in 2025. The cyber landscape is more turbulent than ever. Microsoft recently reported a 2.75-fold increase in ransomware attempts this year, while research predicts that global cyber attacks in 2024 will surge 105% compared to 2020.

value.description: "If you proceed with installing Windows 11, your PC will no longer be supported and won't be entitled to receive updates."

value.name: Office 2019: Your Lifetime Secret Weapon to Productivity Wins

value.name: PSA: Xbox 360's Two Crackdown Games Are Free On The Microsoft Store
value.description: For a while now, a bunch of older Xbox games have been free to claim via the Microsoft Store, particularly from the Xbox 360 generation. Well, two of those games are Crackdown 1 & 2, and there's been lots of social media talk today about them being free - so we thought we'd bring them to your attention once again.
